subject: Re: Matching of filename regular expression (was:pr warn die question)
body:
On 6/1/07, Paul Lalli  wrote:
> On Jun 1, 12:31 pm, chas.ow...@gmail.com (Chas Owens) wrote:
>
> > You might be able to get by with the code in the Perl Cookbook*.

>
> Please don't do that again.  On behalf of those who enjoy the works

Oops, I just Google'd for shell pattern matching code.  I assumed it
was one of the articles that was an authorized reprint from the Perl
Cookbook.
